p: For the genetic monitoring of the O. coerulescens population tissue samples of 285 adult individuals were collected over a period from 1989 up to 2013 (see Table 1) using the non-invasive sampling method of Fincke & Hadrys [ 26] where animals were released afterwards. Collection permits were kindly granted from the RNN des Coussouls de Crau. These samples were stored at -20Â°C until analysis.
